Details.Name: sc_main_benefit
Details.Feature: Redeem your SMRT$ for vouchers and free rides.
Enjoy up to 7% savings on groceries at FairPrice Supermarkets, Giant and Sheng Siong, up to 15% savings on coffee and up to 5% savings on toys & books.
Doubles as an EZ-Link Card for daily commute with an auto top-up function.

Details.Name: sc_gift_cond
Details.Feature: 1. Apply for 2 Citibank Credit Cards and receive approval within 30 days from date of application. 2. Charge a minimum of S$200 per month on either one of the cards for 6 consecutive months. 3. Receive a maximum of $20 cashback per month for 6 consecutive months.

Details.Name: sc_other_fee
Details.Feature: Minimum Repayment: 1% of current a/c balance plus 1% outstanding amount plus late charges or S$50, whichever is higher.

Details.Name: sc_disclosure
Details.Feature: 2% SMRT$ is awarded for EZ-Reload transactions of more than S$30.25. 1% SMRT$ is awarded for EZ-Reload transactions of S$30.25 or less.

5% SMRT$ is awarded for transactions of $50 and above. 3% SMRT$ is awarded for transactions less than $50. Citi Rebate is awarded to transactions made at Sheng Siong and Giant only. 2% Citi Rebate is awarded for transactions of $50 and above. 1% Citi Rebate is awarded for transactions of $20 to less than $50. Other Citi Rebate terms and conditions apply.
10% Citi Rebate is awarded for transactions made at Starbucks outlets in Singapore only. Other Citi Rebate terms and conditions apply.
For monthly statement spend of less than $600, SMRT$ earn rate will be 0.3% less.
Maximum of 280 SMRT$ can be earned during any 12-month period following card issued or renewal.
